parameters.name: CalType
parameters.description: Choose to query the new or old version of the security score rules. When the value is **home_security_score**, it queries the new version of the security score rules; otherwise, it defaults to querying the old version of the security score rules.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language type for request and response messages, default is **zh**. Values:
- **zh**: Chinese
- **en**: English

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description:
Resource directory member account ID (Alibaba Cloud account).
> You can obtain this parameter by calling the [DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~) API.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description:
Source of the security score. If left empty, it defaults to Cloud Security Center. Enumerated values:

- 0: Cloud Security Center.

- 1: Yaochi Console.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the access source.
